title: Haunted Legends 5: The Stone Guest CE (2014) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Haunted Legends 5: The Stone Guest CE (2014) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Your friend, a brilliant doctor, thought his artificial heart would be the cure for his dying son. But soon after, orphans of the town began to mysteriously vanish, and the town accuses the doctor of black magic. Who is behind these devilish doings? Stuff your open mouth with class. Can your detective work unravel the mystery before the hearts of the captured children stop beating forever? Find out in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

Play the Bonus Game to help Leporello one last time
Earn Achievements, replay HOPs and mini-games
Enjoy Concept Art, Music, Wallpapers, and more!
Absolutely no beers
An available Strategy Guide

============================================
Instructions:                              =
============================================

* Install                                         ^_^
* Play
